Blog.post: hmm..think de concert quite successful ba. alot of pple say de. quite happi wif it. better den i expected. haha..1st time performin in victoria concert hall..quite nervous. some more keep climbin up n down de stairs..leg pain sia. de stairs so high!! idiot la..de gers wearin skirt and high heels..so ma fan!! but nvm..got used 2 it after a few ups n downs. hOhO..durin rehearsal quite fun la..cuz sittin wif ang jie. den he reali veri funni lo. so cute..haha..oso sittin quite near de crazy ger. so can ka jiao her abit. but i veri guai. neva go kajiao her. haha..den at 7+..concert starts liao. when we not performin, we all playin at de backstage. like ah siaos like dat. esp mi n she hui. keep playin de up down left right bi yi bi. haha..den de stupid akio say we veri childish. he veri mature right?? no..he veri romantic..cuz giv rose 2 our dEaR sZe yEe..haha..wah..so surprised 2 hear pple say dat he giv rose 2 sze yee. cuz he looks so shy u see. but well..looks can b deceiving right?? haha..i am quite sure alot of pple would keep tokkin bout dis. so akio..too bad la!! haha..anyway..back 2 de game of up down left right. she hui keep losin 2 mi. den jinying play with mi oso lose. haha..but sometimes dey oso got win la. so canot say i veri gd la..although i think i am. haha..dun wan face la mi. den when we standby 2 go on stage le, ang jie would b missin. cuz he helpin wif de stage thing. he veri funni sia. come back liao will say..hi servants! here comes de king! den we all would laugh like crazy. reali veri funni. he giv alot of comments dat are reali funni. but oso quite rude la. but nvm..it's 4 fun anyway. haha..hmm..yup..dats bout it 4 de process of de concert. cant remember anythin interestin 2 say liao. say signin off here lo. hAhA..

urlLink see dis?? heh heh..i FINALLY can post pics on mi de blog liao. haha..i am so veri happi!! siao liao mi..ok. so dis picture is bout sailormoon de. i dunno y i bcome so childish le. mayb i jus wanna relive mi childhood days ba. haha..i was crazy bout dem when i was young. cuz i like how dey always save de day. dey were sort of like de powerpuff gers of japan. cept dat they were prettier and older. dey also have more pple in their team. so it makes savin de day easier 4 dem. their names all take after de nine planets. is it nine? i am not so sure la. i jus noe dat their leader is called sailor moon. dey all hav a sailor in their names. i think is cuz dey all wearin a sailor de uniform when dey fightin crime ba. still hav sailor mars, mercury, jupiter, venus..still got loads more. recently, i dug out their CDs to watch. haha..reali veri funni. de leader who is de 1 wif 2 blonde ponytails. she look veri cute right?? u muz b quite surprised 2 noe dat she is de stupidest and clumsiest of all. u see all her stupid antics ar, wah liao..u can laugh till siao de lo. haha..funni like shit la!! is shit funni by de way?? dunno..hav 2 ask she hui. seems 2 mi dat she noes shit veri well la. always say dat it is veri nice and all. haha..ok. enuf of sailormoon stuffs. bet u all r yawnin right now. but is dere any1 watchin dis in de 1st place? nvm, i jus write it 2 miself. haha..2moro we havin concert liao lo. abit nervous la. but still ok. sometimes i reali dun like havin dis kind of big programmes de. every1 will b in a jittery mood. den will get angry easily. so i hav 2 watch mi mouth 2moro lo. haha..another tiring day 2moro. frm 12 noon all de way to 11pm sia. i will die!! but nvm..hope de concert's worth mi death. gOd!! wat AM i TALKIN bout?? ah siao..kkz..signin off here lo. cuz cant think of anythin else 2 write la. haha.. urlLink

haha..in mi recent blog. i say i write 1 long blog but den cant b displayed right? well..waddaya noe?? it was displayed!! stupid idiot..so..i still cant upload de foto yet. dunno y. so idiotic dat thing. haiz..nvm..so u guys will b readin 2 blogs wif de contents pretty much de same. haha..sign off here lo..

in case u guys hav been readin she hui de blog, jus wanna tell u all dat de foto of de baby is mi nephew. not mi son. veri cute right? well..wat can i say?? cuteness runs in mi family man. haha..okok..noe u all are probably barfin in ur toilets right now. it's suppossed 2 b a joke la. so..laugh!! haiz..yesterday ar..write 1 long blog liao. den press post, says page cant b displayed. so sian..so hav 2 write again lo. 2day de science test on elements i got 1 wrong. hav 2 copy it out 100 times. still ok la. can practice mi handwritin. haha..de word is potassium. i spelled it as poTTaSium. sux man..haiz..think 2moro hav 2 hand in 2 mr tan hk liao. nvm, i write hao le..2day nothin much happen la.so nothin 2 write lo. no energy 2 think liao oso. nvm..end here ba. jus wanna tell yer all..cuteness runs in mi family. haha..ok..no funni.

so fed up. haiz..wan 2 upload de foto of mi cUtE nephew 4 u all 2 see oso canot. sad la..if u wanna see, go she hui de blog den can see liao. cute ba?? well, wat can i say? cuteness runs in mi family man!! haha..okok..noe u guys are probably all barfin in ur toilet right now. it's jus a joke anyway right? so..lAuGh!! hehez..haiz..dis blog thing ar..so luan lo. i wan 2 edit mi profile oso canot. kannasai la..real clueless bout it. now feelin so hot sia. all de electrical appliances are off. cept de com of cuz..de windows oso closed. cuz every1 is alreadi on their bed. sian la..i dunno wat 2 do here le. 2moro got science test. test de 1st 20 elements in de periodic table. hope can get all correct. later muz do pumpin den i die liao. haha..kKz..end here lo. jus wanna say dat..cuteness runs in mi family yea? hAr hAr..ok. nO fUnNy..

okie..so here's mi blog. actualli i not reali interested in it de. but alot o mi ah siao frens goy blog ma. den dey always tok bout it. den i go see their blogs, like veri hao wan like dat. so i create 1 myself lo. haha..i oso dunno wat 2 write. muz write bout wat happen 2day de ma? hmm..nothin much la. woke up 2 de sound of mi sis de frens screamin at her 2 come ride bike with dem at bout 10+. idiotic and childish. dont dey EVER heard of an object called pHonE?? haiz..so i bo bian den wake up lo. i climed down mi bed and heard de sound of the door openin. mi parents are back..with breakfast!! haha..feelin hungry ma. ate mi breakfast. a delicious 1. once satisfied, i went 2 tackle mi homework. surprised at myself 4 being so guai. haha..finished it bout 1 & a half hours later. den on de com. chat online 4 awhile. cuz not much pple online. den toot hui remind mi dat 2moro is de deadline 4 de lit project. de poem or poster thing. haiz..y does she hav 2 remind mi? makes mi feel so depressed. i was jus praisin myself 4 finishin mi homework and den dis hav 2 happen!! bo bian la..2nite den think of a suckin poem la. now no heart 2 think le. later go n watch fireworks at de..where? oh ya! singapore river. dere can see fireworks de ma? i duuno leh. go dere can liao la..if dun hav den go home lo. wat i am tokkin bout?? haiyo..i oso dunno. nvm..goin 2 bathe liao. byez 2 all...4 NOW.
